entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:43 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
